ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: Natalia Go√±i acknowledges support from PEDECIBA, Uruguay. We deeply thank Juan Cristina (Laboratorio de Virologia Molecular, Centro de Investigaciones Nucleares, Facultad de Ciencias, Uruguay) for critical reading of this work and very helpful suggestions. We gratefully acknowledge the Authors and the Originating and Submitting Laboratories for their sequence shared through GISAID, on which this research is based. All submitters of data may be contacted directly via the GISAID website ( www.gisaid.org).
